ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] What does this mean????
ygData.msgSnippet: Basically you have a proc on your weapon..  depending on what it is,  you need to be a certain level before it will proc for you.  If what you have is a velium
ygData.messageBody:
Basically you have a proc on your weapon..  depending on what it is,  you need to be a certain level before it will proc for you.  If what you have is a velium mace,  it won't proc until you are level 25 & by then it is pretty much a useless weapon.  you should look up what weapon you have on allakahzams,  & it will tell you when it will proc for you. (a proc is extra damage,  like a velium weapon procs velium shards for about 25 dmg)

Katashaka

  "Steven R. Hulse" <steve@...> wrote:

Hi again everyone!

      Yesterday I was playing Genmay, my Gnome Warrior and I'm using a
mace as my weapon. I kept getting a message saying something like my
will isn't right to command this weapon. What does that mean? That I'm
not able to use it or more specifically my class doesn't wield this
weapon as well as others? Heck I seemed to be kicking some butt with it
as my hits were ranking between 12-16 points each. Any ideas?
